ygData.subject: Re: Level 9 again
ygData.msgSnippet: If you don t mind taking a ride over to Faydwer, the Chessboard in Butcherblock is a good place to get 10-12 as a Necromancer. If you are facing out of the
ygData.messageBody:
If you don't mind taking a ride over to Faydwer, the Chessboard in
Butcherblock is a good place to get 10-12 as a Necromancer. If you are
facing out of the entrance to Greater Faydark, follow the right wall and it
will shortly be on your left. It's hard to miss: Giant chesspieces and LARGE
skeletons....

Macabre, gnome necromancer (Bertoxxulous server)

----- Original Message -----
From: Jon Fiedler <fiedler@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 8:13 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Level 9 again


> From: "Jon Fiedler" <fiedler@...>
>
> Hi all,
>
> I very recently changed servers and I just got to level 9 with my new DE
> Necro. It has been awhile since I was level 9 on my old server so what I
> did to get through those horrible levels 10 and especially 11 is a little
> hazy. I know a lot of people say Skel Llrod; however, I do remember
trying
> to do that and remember him being camped, having lots of problems with my
> pet, and getting attacked by 20 giant rats and skels every time I tried to
> med. So I have a couple questions:
>
> 1) Any other suggestions for levels 10 and 11
> 2) Is there some trick to pets and medding in Befallen or do I need a REAL
> tank
> 3) Are fire drakes in lava storm doable at 10 and 11 and more importantly
> are they good exp?... I went to lavastorm for the first time when I was 12
> and I remember all the drakes were blue to me then... Since they have a
fire
> attack I'm not sure if my pet and I could hold up for long.
>
> Thanks everyone ,
> Azerin
>
> P.S. I know these kind of posts come along all the time... maybe we should
> make a Necro guide :)
>
